description: Run Amok’s most relaxed offering. Designed with an athletic and functional intent, the short is as ready for a trail run as it is for a coffee run. Constructed from a lightweight REPREVE® recycled polyester with a DWR water resistant finish. Unlined for ultimate versatility with two slash pockets, a side zip pocket and a rear patch pocket with YKK zipper closure. Exterior drawstrings keep them up regardless of the activity at hand.
name: Roark Serrano 2 Shorts - Mens
